member.name: T:GalaxyCoreCommon.GalaxyDeliveryType
member.summary: Message delivery method

member.name: F:GalaxyCoreCommon.GalaxyDeliveryType.unreliable
member.summary: A simple message, without guarantees and sorting, but this is the fastest and most economical option. Such a message is suitable for data with a low value, for example, the movement of a character

member.name: F:GalaxyCoreCommon.GalaxyDeliveryType.unreliableNewest
member.summary: A message with no delivery guarantee, but with automatic discarding of older messages.Also well suited to implement transfers

member.name: F:GalaxyCoreCommon.GalaxyDeliveryType.reliable
member.summary: A message with a guaranteed delivery, but without observing the exact sequence, is well suited for sending important data, the order of receiving and receiving of which is not important

member.name: F:GalaxyCoreCommon.GalaxyDeliveryType.reliableNewest
member.summary: A message with guaranteed delivery, but with automatic discarding of older messages, is suitable for important data, in cases where the last received message is more important than the previous one.

member.name: F:GalaxyCoreCommon.GalaxyDeliveryType.reliableOrdered
member.summary: A message with a delivery guarantee and a priority guarantee. Messages are guaranteed to be received in the same order as they were sent, suitable for the most important messages, the delivery speed of which is not critical.

member.returns: The new root, or the existing one if we didn't shrink.
